snippet: The Day: Darius McCollum, who has posed as a transit worker and commandeered subway trains, has been arrested 27 times. But is locking him up over and over the most sensible approach?
abstract: The Day: Darius McCollum, who has posed as a transit worker and commandeered subway trains, has been arrested 27 times. But is locking him up over and over the most sensible approach?

headline.main: In Court, Trying to Understand Asperger Syndrome
